ExternalProject_Add(bpftool
    PREFIX ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
    SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bpftool/src
    CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_COMMAND make -s -j EXTRA_CFLAGS="-DPACKAGE_VERSION=1 --static" OUTPUT=${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/
    BUILD_IN_SOURCE TRUE
    INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    STEP_TARGETS build
)

set(bpftool_VERSION "7.2.0" PARENT_SCOPE)
set(bpftool_EXECUTABLE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bpftool PARENT_SCOPE)
